text:
@narendramodi @nsitharamanoffc sir.. we have seen in that news channel that central government is not considering Karnataka for covid relief fund. Our @CMofKarnataka  has been working for 24/7 towards covid-19 and has taken necessary action as well.
@BSYBJP @mepratap @Tejasvi_Surya @JoshiPralhad
